game.name: Grim Dawn - Steam Loyalist Items Pack 2
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Whether you're an old fan or just purchasing Grim Dawn, this fantasy-themed collection of vanity items allows you to bring out the classic fantasy hero within you. The items in this DLC can be applied to existing gear to transform the look while retaining the original stats.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Whether you're an old fan or just purchasing Grim Dawn, this fantasy-themed collection of vanity items allows you to bring out the classic fantasy hero within you. The items in this DLC can be applied to existing gear to transform the look while retaining the original stats.
